page.title: 07 COAST VIEW COUNTRY CLUB
page.content: 5.What type of people come to stay? All types but mostly families who return year after year. 6.What part of Britain do they mostly come from? Birmingham, London, Liverpool and Scotland. Motorway access plays an im- portant role in the number of visitors. 7.Are there many overseas visitors? There are not many but theyare mainly Dutch, German, Swiss and American. 8.How long do your visitors stay? The average stay is 1 week, dependant on the weather. 9.Do you have regular customers? 75% are regular yearly customers be- cause they like the camps atmosphere. 10.Have the expectations of your visitors changed since you opened? They are higher as the living standard has to be the same as at home.
